summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4086 for the improvement of 42nd Avenue Southwest, from West Juneau Street to West Morgan Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49118, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
